channel.title: Hey all my 1st post Zenithscape help pleasee *important*
channel.description:
hey everyone this is my 1st post , i dont normally need help but i do now heheh anyways i am using zenithscape souce and i have a few of my mate on my server we wanted to pk yesterday but im maxed is there anyway i can max them or give them 99's :confused:
also how do i add a i buy anything shop, add my bro on skype he is my coder ;) : Owner.Divine
need help asap thanks -jess xx :)

item.title: Hey all my 1st post Zenithscape help pleasee *important*
item.dc:creator: @Sup22211 Sup22211
item.description:
@Sup22211 wrote:

And this works?
if it is use like this @jess xx

 if(cmd[0].equals("::master")) {
                                                for(int i = 0; i < 24; i++) {
                                                        player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000);
                                                }

Anyways should work like this or like lirimmo posted…

Read full topic

if(cmd[0].equals("::master")) { if(cmd.length == 1) { for(int i = 0; i < Skills.SKILL_COUNT; i++) { player.getSkills().addXp(i, 200000000); }

item.title: Hey all my 1st post Zenithscape help pleasee *important*
item.dc:creator: @Lirimoo Lirimoo
item.description:
@Lirimoo wrote:

[quote=“jess xx, post:6, topic:509074”]im confutioned can u add my bro on skype
Owner.divine [/quote]

Grammar…

And go into Data, then Characters and there are Files named on the name of the player.
Open it, scroll down, Theres something like ‘Character - Stats’ or something.
Change the XP to 14000000 and the level to 99 of each skill.

Read full topic

item.description:
@ElmosWorld wrote:

There should be a character folder in your source, go to that find there character name click and edit it and you should be able to change there skills to 99 in there. should be like a notepad with there name that you can get into and edit there character.
